build i1026

I am working on moving preference change notification to the background and I
have come across a problem where I get an InvalidThreadAccess. 

It looks like the PlatformUIPreferenceListener is reacting to a change in the
location of the perspective bar and changing it in the window. 

When it does this, it is assuming that the notification is happening in the UI
thread. 

Is this a valid assumption?
